title: Ticket #3459: Allow Lark networking to be used for stage-in / stage-out
description:
Right now, the Lark networking is setup only for the duration of the job. We should additionally make the devices available for the stagein / stageout of the job.

This might be somewhat straightforward if we configure the network once, but create a separate device pair for stagein/out and the job.
remarks:
2013-Jul-02 08:39:12 by bbockelm:
This has been implemented for file transfer plugins. We don't yet re-open the xfer socket back to the shadow in the file transfer process.

2013-Jul-02 18:28:41 by bbockelm:
Ok, with the latest commit, connecting the socket to the shadow is delayed until the network namespace is created.

I've confirmed that file transfers go through the child namespace.
